=== How can I use the Plugin? ===

  # [http://code.google.com/p/struts2-jquery/downloads/list Download] the struts2-jquery-plugin-x.x.x.jar 
  # Put it into your Classpath (WEB-INF/lib)
  # Add the Tag-Lib to your JSP `<%@ taglib prefix="sj" uri="/struts-jquery-tags"%>`
  # Place the [HeadTag Head Tag] inside your html head tags

=== Can I use my own Theme? ===

Yes, see Details about Theming in the [HeadTag Head Tag Wiki]

== Performance ==

=== Can I use Google as CDN? ===

Yes, just set the *loadFromGoogle* Attribute in the [HeadTag Head Tag] to *true*.

== Development ==

=== How can I make a Contribution? ===

Contributions are welcome, please start a new Issue and attach the patch file.

=== Exists a User Group? ===

For Questions around the Plugin you can use this [http://groups.google.com/group/struts2-jquery User Group]
